item.description:
Hey guys, How many of you have to take the Toefl test which is required for non-native speakers to get into college? Thanks Reece for giving me this opportunity to organize this meet up. here, i want to contribute my own time to help people get together to share English study experience, materials, even cultural shock. For this meeting, please bring the materials that you are studying for the Toefl test. we can share study techniques, ask questions, and learn together. Our meet up will be at Borders Books from 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM. Food and drinks are available here.

Take the T to downtown boston, www.mbta.com.

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a sign up!

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: English Toefl Study Group ( All Levels welcome )
